title: Between 1 October 2017 and 30 September 2018, will an armed group from Pakistan engage in a campaign that systematically kills 1,000 or more civilians in Pakistan?
preds: This year will be unrest in Pakistan.
Don't foresee any military coups or general public uprising in Pakistan yet.

If the pattern repeats - Pak diplomatic complaint about cross border attacks from Afghanistan often resut in temporary tightening of the crossing and a switch to insurgents launching attacks from inside Pakistan as these attacks are often about diversion while troops and laborers move about to accommodate the Poppy season.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.

Pakistan is a country with lots of weapons, lots of people radicalized, lots of grievances and a government unable in some cases and unwilling in other cases to enforce order. Chaos will find no better home in 2018.
